Are you looking for the complete list of Democratic Candidates and their odds of being the 2024 Democratic Primary? This page is the single most accurate predictor. We use wisdom of the crowd and betting odds, so the outputs are much more accurate than fivethirtyeight or any single model. Bookmark this page and keep coming back as the race hots up. - - - ## **2024 Democratic Candidate Odds** - - -

Whilst we won’t be creating data model predictions from the 2024 Election, we’ll have all your favorites sports. We’re winning sports bettors and our tips are free. Join our mailing list for exclusive access as soon as our NFL, NBA, tennis, golf and other models are released. - - - ### **Sign up for the Wednesday email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.**
